EmailTemplate.subject: Direct-To Aviation Newsletter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Global Customer Committee (GCC) News PC-12 NG Success Story By Stephen D. Hammack The newly released LDI lessens premature filling of the Fault History Database and generation of the “MAINT MEMORY FULL” CAS message... Read More <[[#]]>
ATC Log Management Message Retention Logic on G450/G550 By Candace Gunning Honeywell Engineering explains how ATC Log Management Logic works... Read more <[[#]]>
Flight Bag Pro Changes Latest Improvements and Upgrades By Heidi Lichtenstein The GoDirect Team is excited to announce several improvements and changes to the Flight Bag Pro app . . . Read more <[[#?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]>
Inside the FMS (NG FMS Vertical Navigation Graphic Representations) VNAV Logic By Heidi Lichtenstein For those operating Next Generation FMS-equipped airplanes, there are many changes to the VNAV architecture that add functionality while making the system more intuitive . . . Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/~/media/Pilots App/Documents/Other Resources/Gulfstream VNAV Mission Scenario]]>
